content:encoded:
Mark Your Calendar:

We will be hosting a 2019 Data Science Bowl TweetChat/#DataSciChat on Twitter, November 14, 2019 from 13:00 – 14:00 EDT (1-2pm EDT/US Eastern).

The conversation will be hosted by Kirk Borne (@KirkDBorne) of @BoozAllen. He will be joined by Joe Rohner (@RohnerJoe), @BoozAllen, Data Science Bowl Lead; Jeremy Roberts (@JeremyR46362652), Director of Learning Technologies @PBSKIDS; and other Data Science Bowl team members.

Come join the conversation about #DataScience #MachineLearning #EarlyChildhoodEducation #DataSciBowl.

To join and view the chat during the session, use the hashtag #DataSciChat. We’ll cover questions on Data Science, Social Good and Early Childhood Learning as it relates to this year’s competition purpose.

The post TweetChat – 2019 Data Science Bowl, November 14, 13:00 – 14:00 EDT #DataSciChat appeared first on The Data Science Bowl.
